text:
- Hey, I want to return this game.
- Sorry, bud. Looks like you bought this used.

- But it's-- it's-- it's broken!
It doesn't even work.

- Hmm.
- Seriously, try it!
(exhausted sigh)
(dramatic music)

- Looks fine to me.
- Keep going.

(bang!)
(body thuds)
(triumphant music)
- So what's the problem?

- Well, the-- what's the pro--?
Well, there's no game!

- Seems right to me.
- What?! You-You just die in the tutorial?

- I suppose in your game Hitler gets to live.
- What?! No!
I-I just-- I paid $40 for this!
You know who paid a lot more than $40?

Uh, let's see. 
Most of Europe, the Jews
the American soldiers who gave their--
- Look, look-- I don't want to get into a whole--

you know, I just-- I expect 
that when I buy a game I--

- You get to kill Jews! 
I understand perfectly.

- Look, no! I-I just--
I just want my money back. Come on!
Well, can I-- can I-- can I exchange it?

- Yeah, sure.
- Good! Uh, what can I exchange it for?
- (sighs) Anything from the used shelf.
- (Nazi) They're in the attic!
(gunfire)
(game over chime)
